title: Italy dancing with the 5-Stars but vote inconclusive
text:
Italy dancing with the 5-Stars but vote inconclusive   01:52 
Investors dumped Italy's government bonds on Monday after the weekend Italian election saw a surge in support for anti-establishment parties, led by the 5-Star Movement. As Silvia Antonioli reports, the surge to parties sceptical of the EU could prove a setback to stable government and to wider European integration. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
